aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.subtitle: I'm a passionate coding student with a deep fascination for cybersecurity and modern web development. My journey into technology began with a curiosity about how we can make a piece of rock into a CPU that runs the world nowadays and how digital systems work, which evolved into a passion for building secure and easy-to-use applications. I currently plan to pursue a degree in Software Engineering, having completed a technical degree in Systems Analysis and Development. I spend my days mastering React and JavaScript, and exploring the intersection of development and security. I believe that great code isn't just functional‚Äîit's secure, accessible, and meaningful. When I'm not coding, you'll find me researching the latest cybersecurity trends, running bootcamps, and watching personal growth videos.

id1.subtitle: technical course in systems analysis and development

id1.description: A technical undergraduate program focused on software development and systems analysis. Covers programming logic, databases, software engineering, computer networks, and agile methodologies. Provides a solid foundation for roles such as full-stack developer, systems analyst, or IT professional.

id2.subtitle: Advanced English Course

id2.description: Comprehensive English course focused on speaking, listening, reading, and writing skills. Achieved fluency in the language, with strong command of technical vocabulary and effective communication in academic and professional contexts. Earned advanced-level certification upon completing oral and written assessments.

highlights.fluentCommunication: Fluent English for daily and professional communication

id3.subtitle: Self-Taught Web Development Learning
id3.title: Main Learning Channels and Areas
id3.description: Continuous study of web technologies through online courses, videos, documentation, and personal projects. Focus on both front-end and back-end development, with hands-on application in real projects and mastery of modern tools in the JavaScript ecosystem.

highlights.responsiveDesign: Hands-on experience with responsive design using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.
highlights.debuggingSkills: Skilled in using DevTools and JS console to find and fix bugs.
highlights.learningDiscipline: Self-discipline in studying web development with focus on best practices and modern stack.

learningFocus.title: Current Learning Focus
learningFocus.subtitle: I'm currently deepening my expertise in advanced React patterns, exploring serverless architectures, and pursuing additional cybersecurity certifications to bridge the gap between development and security.

valueData.title: Core Values & Philosophy
valueData.subtitle: The principles that guide my approach to development and professional growth

id1.title: Security First
id1.description: I believe that secure code is good code. Every application should be built with security considerations from the ground up, not as an afterthought.

id2.title: User-Centric Design
id2.description: Technology should serve people, not the other way around. I focus on creating intuitive, accessible experiences that solve real problems.

id3.title: Continuous Learning
id3.description: The tech industry evolves rapidly, and I embrace this change by constantly learning new technologies, methodologies, and best practices.

id4.title: Clean Code
id4.description: Code should be readable, maintainable, and well-documented. I strive to write code that my future self and teammates will thank me for.

id5.title: Collaboration
id5.description: Great software is built by great teams. I value open communication, knowledge sharing, and collective problem-solving.

id6.title: Innovation
id6.description: I'm passionate about exploring new technologies and finding creative solutions to complex problems while maintaining practical feasibility.

myDevPhilosophy.title: My Development Philosophy
myDevPhilosophy.subtitle: I believe that great software is born from the intersection of technical excellence, user empathy, and continuous learning. Every line of code I write is an opportunity to create something meaningful, secure, and impactful. My goal is not just to build applications, but to craft digital experiences that make a positive difference in people's lives while maintaining the highest standards of security and performance.

collab.subtitle: I'm always excited to discuss new opportunities, share knowledge, or collaborate on interesting projects. Let's build something amazing together!

myProjects.subtitle: Explore my journey through code. Each project represents a step forward in my development skills, showcasing creativity, problem-solving, and technical growth.

question01.title: What's your typical response time?
question01.subtitle: I usually respond within 24 hours, often much faster during business hours.

question02.title: What types of projects do you work on?
question02.subtitle: I specialize in React applications, responsive websites, and modern web development. I'm particularly interested in projects involving user experience and interactive interfaces.

question03.title: Do you work with teams or solo clients?
question03.subtitle: Both! I enjoy collaborating with development teams and also work directly with individual clients and startups.

question04.title: What's your availability like?
question04.subtitle: I'm currently available for new projects. My schedule varies, but I always communicate clearly about timelines and availability.
